title: 2022 Week 7 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
itunes:title: 2022 Week 7 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview all the games on the Week 7 slate, starting with the primetime matchups: Steelers at Dolphins (3:35) and Bears at Patriots (9:03). Then, we begin the draft with Chiefs at 49ers (16:13) and preview the rest of the games: Seahawks at Chargers (23:12), Texans at Raiders (30:04), Giants at Jaguars (33:47), Lions at Cowboys (44:15), Jets at Broncos (50:14), Falcons at Bengals (57:14), Browns at Ravens (1:04:44), Buccaneers at Panthers (1:11:53), Colts at Titans (1:17:09), and finally Packers at Commanders (1:23:48). Marc has one of the biggest reaches in the history of the draft, each of the heroes makes their lock-of-the-week pick, and the Cincinnati Zoo returns again.

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
